title: What would you do if you only had one week in Silicon Valley and know anyone there? - Quora
tags: Visiting and Travel in Silicon Valley
Startup Advice and Strategy in Silicon Valley

response.answer_text: Do not miss the Computer History Museum. There is also the Intel Museum: Journey Through Decades of Innovation. For some really superb wines, make the drive to Thomas Fogarty Vineyards (Santa Cruz Mountains Vineyard in Bay Area California). Before going, buy a picnic lunch at Draegers: Home (the winery has a great outdoor dining area). Then go see Castle Rock State Park Dine at: The Armenian Gourmet (don't miss the lahmajun)New Port Dim Sum Restaurant SunnyvaleSushi Restaurant TOMI SUSHI, San Jose CABill of Fare (Breakfast)Quincy's Bar-B-Q - About - Google+To meet interesting people, get a free copy of the local Metro newspaper and examine the events section. Depending upon how you define "interesting people", hit any of the art museums, parks, festivals or popular cafes. Some feature open microphone nights that can provide really high quality entertainment.
